text:
My jsp file name "eHistoryPage3.jsp" but somehow it becomes "ehistoryPage3.jsp" 
and "ehistoryPage3.jsp" under 
<TOmcat>/work/catalina/com/org/apache/jsp//WEB_002dINF/view/pehistory/
creator: ydao@eheintl.com

text:
This works for me. It is most likely some form of configuration error. Please
use the users list to debug.

If the users list discussion concludes that it is a bug, please re-open this
report and attached the simplest JSP or WAR that demonstrates the issue on a
clean install of the latest stable 6.0.x release.
creator: markt@apache.org
